main event: An observer reported seeing two bright lights in the sky that suddenly burst and were too bright for car lights.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1-2 minutes., The lights were about the size of the palm of a hand held at arm's length., The observer originally thought the lights were car lights until they burst., The observer mentioned it was a clear night with bright moonlight., The location was specified as Hillsboro, Illinois.
sighted object: two bright lights in the sky
witness description: an observer who reported the sighting
